data.title: Olivia Newton
data.meta_description: Olivia Newton-John (born in Cambridge, England, September 29, 1948, died August 8, 2022) was raised in Melbourne, Australia, by her Welsh father and her German-Jewish mother. A singer-songwriter, four-time Grammy winner, she starred with John Travolta in the movie version of the Broadway musical Grease (1978) directed by Randal Kleiser and in Two of a […]
